name: dev-server
description: All my Developemnts related Api's goes here. all these functions are deployed in an aws instance

scripts.deploy: rsync -avz --exclude node_modules --exclude .git '-e ssh -i ~/keys/aws-test-server.pem' ./ ubuntu@3.7.72.9:/var/www/dev-server/src && ssh -i ~/keys/aws-test-server.pem ubuntu@3.7.72.9 'sudo systemctl restart dev-server.service'

author: https://twitter.com/sanjaygoswmai60
